statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM user_preferences ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' AND language = 'en'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, customization_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE customization_settings->>'font_size' = '16px';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'english' AND theme IN ('light', 'dark');
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences;
SELECT preference_1, user_id, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, preference_1 AS favorite_preference, preference_2 FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_preferences FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, content_id, rating FROM content_recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_1 DESC;
SELECT cp.user_id, cp.content_id, cr.rating FROM content_recommendations cr LEFT JOIN user_preferences cp ON cr.user_id = cp.user_id WHERE cr.rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%Music%';
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 IN ('Sports', 'Books');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description, category FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, course_name, recommendation_date FROM recommendations JOIN courses ON recommendations.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE score > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, category FROM courses WHERE category = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_name, recommendation_date FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, course_name, recommendation_date FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id WHERE score > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, title, description FROM content WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, language FROM preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, language, theme FROM preferences INNER JOIN users ON preferences.user_id = users.user_id WHERE language = 'English' AND theme = 'Dark';
SELECT content_id, title, description FROM content WHERE category IN ('Technology', 'Science') ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT r.rec_id, u.username, c.title FROM recommendations r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN content c ON r.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.username = 'example_user';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT title, description, category FROM content WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT user_id, content_id, rating FROM user_content WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC, content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, c.title, recommendation_text FROM recommendations r JOIN content c ON r.content_id = c.content_id WHERE r.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC, username ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT content.title, content.category, user_content.rating FROM content JOIN user_content ON content.content_id = user_content.content_id ORDER BY user_content.rating DESC
SELECT users.username, preferences.theme FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE preferences.language = 'English'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(content_id) AS content_count FROM user_content GROUP BY user_id HAVING content_count > 3
